page.title: 16POLITICS
page.content: At present the M.P. for the{East {Lothian constituency}is{John Home {Robertson}(Labour). This seat was previously held along with the Berwickshire seat by{John P. {Mackintosh.}He won the seat in the {1966 General Election.}This was the only seat to be won by{Labour}from another party in those elections.He was very popular and almost S.N.P. {(Scottish National Party)}in his views and was also in favour of a{Scottish {Assembly.}Because of this he often clashed with the party in policy. {David O.Thomson}from Haddington is one of the present{Lothian Regional {Councillors}and represents the {Conservative Party}in East Lothian. The new candidate for the{Liberal/SDP {Alliance}is Mr A W Robinson.
